entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
